mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.APPELLATION as appellation, a.LAST_NAME as lastName, a.MIDDLE_NAME as middleName, a.FIRST_NAME as firstName, a.SUFFIX as suffix, a.EMAIL as email, a.ETITY_RELATIONSHIP as etityRelationship, a.AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP as authorizedRelationship, a.USER_NAME as userName, a.PASSWORD as password, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , APPELLATION , LAST_NAME , MIDDLE_NAME , FIRST_NAME , SUFFIX , EMAIL , ETITY_RELATIONSHIP , AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP , USER_NAME , PASSWORD , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{appellation} , #{lastName} , #{middleName} , #{firstName} , #{suffix} , #{email} , #{etityRelationship} , #{authorizedRelationship} , #{userName} , #{password} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
APPELLATION ,
LAST_NAME ,
MIDDLE_NAME ,
FIRST_NAME ,
SUFFIX ,
EMAIL ,
ETITY_RELATIONSHIP ,
AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP ,

PASSWORD ,

CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE

#{accountId} ,
#{appellation} ,
#{lastName} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
APPELLATION = #{appellation} ,
LAST_NAME = #{lastName} ,
MIDDLE_NAME = #{middleName} ,
FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} ,
SUFFIX = #{suffix} ,
EMAIL = #{email} ,
ETITY_RELATIONSHIP = #{etityRelationship} ,
AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP = #{authorizedRelationship} ,
USER_NAME = #{userName} ,
PASSWORD = #{password} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , APPELLATION , LAST_NAME , MIDDLE_NAME , FIRST_NAME , SUFFIX , EMAIL , ETITY_RELATIONSHIP , AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP , USER_NAME , PASSWORD , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.appellation} , #{item.lastName} , #{item.middleName} , #{item.firstName} , #{item.suffix} , #{item.email} , #{item.etityRelationship} , #{item.authorizedRelationship} , #{item.userName} , #{item.password} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , APPELLATION = #{item.appellation} , LAST_NAME = #{item.lastName} , MIDDLE_NAME = #{item.middleName} , FIRST_NAME = #{item.firstName} , SUFFIX = #{item.suffix} , EMAIL = #{item.email} , ETITY_RELATIONSHIP = #{item.etityRelationship} , AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP = #{item.authorizedRelationship} , USER_NAME = #{item.userName} , PASSWORD = #{item.password} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , APPELLATION = #{appellation} , LAST_NAME = #{lastName} , MIDDLE_NAME = #{middleName} , FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} , SUFFIX = #{suffix} , EMAIL = #{email} , ETITY_RELATIONSHIP = #{etityRelationship} , AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP = #{authorizedRelationship} , USER_NAME = #{userName} , PASSWORD = #{password} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_SECURITY_OFFICER a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
AND a.APPELLATION LIKE '%'||#{appellation}||'%'
AND a.LAST_NAME LIKE '%'||#{lastName}||'%'
AND a.MIDDLE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{middleName}||'%'
AND a.FIRST_NAME LIKE '%'||#{firstName}||'%'
AND a.SUFFIX LIKE '%'||#{suffix}||'%'
AND a.EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{email}||'%'
AND a.ETITY_RELATIONSHIP LIKE '%'||#{etityRelationship}||'%'
AND a.AUTHORIZED_RELATIONSHIP LIKE '%'||#{authorizedRelationship}||'%'
AND a.USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{userName}||'%'
AND a.PASSWORD LIKE '%'||#{password}||'%'
AND a.CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}
AND a.CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate}
AND a.UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}
AND a.UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
